org.parboiled.ContextAware<org.pegdown.ast.Node>, org.pegdown.ast.SimpleNodeTypes, Extensions
public class Parser
extends org.parboiled.BaseParser<org.pegdown.ast.Node>
implements org.pegdown.ast.SimpleNodeTypes, Extensions

Parboiled parser for the standard and extended markdown syntax. Builds an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) of Node objects.
